item.title: R2D2 Arm Connected to RPI3 With PCA9685
item.description: RPI3 You can use the RPI3 to use the servos. But the servo power will need to separte from the RPI3. The RPI3’s 5V is not enough to use servos long term. For initial testing they will work. But what you will find is the servos will glitch if connected to the RPI3’s header. The RPI3 causes the glitches. So eventually you need to find an alternative way to run the servos.
